attributes.action: Add floodlight at mayflower parks basketball courts, Southampton
attributes.additional_details: So more people can use it in the winters and later in the summers
attributes.background: They can put them in place

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You could also start a local petition:

https://www.southampton.gov.uk/moderngov/mgGeneric.aspx?MD=Petitions
